name: U.A.V.'s Aeronautics s.l.u.
goal:
To be an actor key in the development of the technologies of the UAV's and in the expansion of the applications of the same ones.
To make available the UAV's for the professionals and the companies, so that they can use this technology to improve his productivity and his competitiveness.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Energy, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Legislation and policies about RPAS, Air Trafic management, Airworthiness and Big-Data.
